thread.title: Lonely little girls should shout loudly about their love of video games
thread.title_full: Lonely little girls should shout loudly about their love of video games

author: Sally Peck
title: Lonely little girls should shout loudly about their love of video games
text: Mother Tongue Lonely little girls should shout loudly about their love of video games A new study has found that more girls than ever are playing computer games. The difference from boys? They're offline and silent. Sally Peck isn't impressed A study has found that little girls play games alone and offline Photo: Getty Images
